Name: DedeCMS 5.8.1 RCE
Description:
DedeCMS is an open source content management system.

DedeCMS content management system 5.8.1 internal test version common.func.php has a code execution vulnerability. Attackers can use this vulnerability to gain server control permissions.
Author: 1291904552@qq.com
Impact: DedeCMS content management system 5.8.1 internal test version common.func.php has a code execution vulnerability. Attackers can use this vulnerability to gain server control permissions.
Recommandation:
The vendor has released a bug fix, please pay attention to the update in time: http://www.dedecms.com

1. Set access policies and whitelist access through security devices such as firewalls.

2. If not necessary, prohibit public network access to the system.

CN.Name: DedeCMS 内容管理系统5.8.1版本远程代码执行漏洞
CN.Description:
DedeCMS是一款开源的内容管理系统。

DedeCMS内容管理系统5.8.1内测版本common.func.php存在代码执行漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取服务器控制权限。
CN.Impact: DedeCMS内容管理系统5.8.1内测版本common.func.php存在代码执行漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取服务器控制权限。
CN.Recommendation:
⼚商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新： http://www.dedecms.com

1、通过防⽕墙等安全设备设置访问策略，设置⽩名单访问。

2、如⾮必要，禁⽌公⽹访问该系统。

EN.Name: DedeCMS 5.8.1 RCE
EN.Description:
DedeCMS is an open source content management system.

DedeCMS content management system 5.8.1 internal test version common.func.php has a code execution vulnerability. Attackers can use this vulnerability to gain server control permissions.
EN.Impact: DedeCMS content management system 5.8.1 internal test version common.func.php has a code execution vulnerability. Attackers can use this vulnerability to gain server control permissions.
EN.Recommendation:
The vendor has released a bug fix, please pay attention to the update in time: http://www.dedecms.com

1. Set access policies and whitelist access through security devices such as firewalls.

2.If not necessary, prohibit public network access to the system.
